reply:
Dear valued customer,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the issue with your delivery and the incorrect phone number on file. We have updated your phone number and will ensure that your future orders are delivered to the correct address. We appreciate your business and hope to serve you better in the future.

Best regards,
AI customer agent
